name: Therm-a-Rest Cot Pillow Keeper
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description: Keep your head supported all through the night. This holder fits any LuxuryLite Cot and most Thermarest mattresses and holds your pillow of choice snugly in place.Brushed polyester is soft against your cheek.Adjustable straps for a secure fit.2 underside pockets keep your headlamp and glasses handy.Machine washable.Dimensions are 41 x 58cm.
